trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_000<tab>To hear Thesauros's excuses, one might think it necessary to sell your firstborn to afford a comfortable chair and desk. Surely it isn't <var 1A 02 /var>impossible<var 1A 01 /var> to properly furnish a laboratory on a budget?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_001<tab>Hello, my fair gleaner! How goes the campaign of feline satisfaction?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_002<tab>Oh good, you're back. I think Ibuki is growing restless, so let's surround her with darling monstrosities before she launches a second assault upon Hodge.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_003<tab>A pleasure as always, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((man)) /var> of peerless procurement. Have you anything to soothe Grondilvet's tired eyes?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_004<tab>Another day, another battle of attrition against the enemies of ingenuity. Thrice-damned misers, the lot of them. But how do <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> fare, my friend?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Make a delivery (<var 20 E803 /var> remaining).
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Cast glamour on Margrat.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Learn about custom deliveries.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>What would you learn more about?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>Satisfaction level.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Delivery requirements and rewards.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>Procuring collectables.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>Acquiring materials.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>Increasing the value of crafted collectables.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>Increasing the value of gathered collectables.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>Increasing the value of fish.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_001_000<tab>With each successful delivery, Margrat will come to trust you more and more, leading her to task you with assignments of greater importance.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_001_001<tab>This will be displayed in the form of a gauge atop the Custom Deliveries list. Fill this gauge to the maximum, and Margrat's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─as represented by little golden hearts─will increase.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Upon reaching a new <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you will have the opportunity to learn more about the researchers of Labyrinthos.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_007_000<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 80 or above.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_007_001<tab>If you are level 99 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 100 scrips reward.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Should you find yourself unsure as to how to procure a particular item, subcommands and item descriptions can point you in the right direction.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_001<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Likewise, for Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_003<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_102_003<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_004<tab>The items sought by Margrat fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Margrat deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Margrat seeks may be purchased from R'dhyanki in Sharlayan Hamlet.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_000<tab>The collectability of crafted items is directly related to their quality. Spare no effort in ensuring that the items you craft are of the highest possible quality, and you will be rewarded accordingly.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_002<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inner Quiet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, granted each time you successfully increase quality, will serve you particularly well.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_003<tab>Accumulate as many stacks of the status as you can, then put the final flourish on your masterpiece with <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Byregot's Blessing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_004<tab>There are a host of other actions that can serve to further enhance the quality of items you craft. Once you've mastered the fundamentals, you are encouraged to experiment with varied approaches until you find your preferred crafting method.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Before gathering a collectable item, you must increase its collectability.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_001<tab>One technique miners and botanists may employ to raise collectability is the use of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scrutiny<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scour<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Try executing this combination a few times before gathering the item.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_002<tab>Gatherers seeking to procure items with higher collectability must be certain to equip gear with higher <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> ratings, as these attributes influence the effectiveness of actions that raise collectability.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Of course, these actions cannot be used to their full potential without sufficient <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>GP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. A healthy balance of all three attributes is essential to make the most of your gathering.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_000<tab>The collectability value of fish follows a simple rule─the bigger, the better.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Upon arriving at the fishing hole or teeming waters where your desired quarry resides, use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action, then begin fishing or spearfishing.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_002<tab>When fishing, using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by effective hooking actions will increase your chances of reeling in a big one.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Should you still find yourself catching only small fry, try outfitting yourself with better equipment to raise your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_000<tab>The items sought by Margrat fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Margrat deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_008<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 80 or above.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_009<tab>If you are level 99 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 100 scrips reward.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>Information on how to find individual items may be found in the following manner:

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_002<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the relevant recipes.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_003<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Margrat seeks may be purchased from R'dhyanki in Sharlayan Hamlet.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_004<tab>For Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log and recipes in question.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_005<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>The higher an item's collectability, the greater the reward you will earn from Margrat upon successful delivery.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>To learn more about collectables and how to increase collectability, speak with Margrat and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Learn about custom deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Margrat's trust.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>With each successful delivery, Margrat will grow more and more satisfied with your efforts. Fill the gauge completely and Margrat's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, giving you the opportunity to learn more about her.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>You can make up to six deliveries in a given week. Deliver the items Margrat needs, and deliver them often to win the trust and praise of your loquacious associate!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>You have reached the weekly limit for deliveries. You may begin again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_000<tab>Sometimes a good cushion is all you need to transform any old chair into posterial paradise. I've even heard of designs that incorporate gelatinous material sourced from─well. So long as it's comfortable, right?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_001<tab>Treats and toys seem like promising candidates, but whether your devotion will be requited for long─if at all─depends on the kitty in question. Perhaps a wad of crinkly paper or a simple box will suffice?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_002<tab>It sounds like you're free to procure anything from grotesquely realistic clay sculptures to adorable plush creatures. Let it be known that I humbly request permission to squeeze should your donation be of the latter persuasion.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_003<tab>Eye drops may seem like the obvious <var 1A 02 /var>solution<var 1A 01 /var>─ha! Get it?─but if you ask me, Grondilvet might benefit as much if not more from a fluffy bed or an eye mask. A quarter-bell nap can do wonders for one's health.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_004<tab>Any number of things can help facilitate relaxation─refreshing drinks, tasty snacks, mammet masseurs, you name it. All the more effective when prepared by <var 29 EB02 /var> <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>self!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_000<tab>Stones with magnetic properties and herbal compresses are supposedly effective remedies for ailing backs, but do you know what's even better? Actual rest.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_001<tab>There is a plant which can induce a state of euphoria in felines, as I recall. Failing that, there's always the classic sandbox, which cats may utilize for their, er...daily constitutionals.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_002<tab>Let's give Ibuki whatever she needs to reverently whisper, “I've created a <var 1A 02 /var>monster<var 1A 01 /var>.” That's how we'll know we're on the right track.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_003<tab>Here's a clever trick for pain relief: warm some stones or poultices and then press them to your eyes. Or neck. Or back. Or anywhere, really...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_004<tab>Our refreshment room is supplied with water and tea, but what could spark more joy than knowing <var 29 EB02 /var> has topped up our ice and replenished our leaves? Our beverages will never taste better, this I can assure you.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_000<tab>Back pain may be a symptom of a deficiency of nutrients essential for bone development. The positive effects of a balanced diet may not manifest immediately, but who doesn't <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> better after a healthy meal?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_001<tab>Some cats can't eat fish, and most fish can't eat cats, but what can some cats eat that most fish can't? ...Catfish.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_002<tab>Certain shells are ground into powder for their pigments, and yet others make delightful decorations as they are. The right shade or sparkle can spur the spirit into a creative frenzy!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_003<tab>Blueback fish are apparently rich in nutrients that help prevent ocular exhaustion and dry eyes. Let's hope Grondilvet and his colleagues like seafood!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_004<tab>After exhausting our daily cerebral capital, we often find ourselves gazing vacantly into the abyss...but think how less ominous it would be to gaze vacantly into an aquarium filled with colorful fish! Truly the height of luxury and far better for the soul.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_000<tab>...Yes, this should do nicely! A timely delivery of sufficient quality. Bravo!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_001<tab>...Well, well! If I were a small animal, I might be inclined to run circles around you in delight. But I'm not, so I won't. Thank you, though!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_002<tab>...Do you normally fling items of extraordinary quality to whomsoever is in need? Because such behavior may condition people to trail behind you like awestruck ducklings─myself included.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_003<tab>...Even after all this time, your capacity for peerless quality is astounding. How could I <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> break into celebratory dance? ...Embarrassing? Perish the thought!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>To collect your reward, make room in your inventory and speak with Margrat once more.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_000_000<tab>These should make all the difference! Wait here; I'll go and deliver them to my colleagues.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_001_000<tab>Cats have never struck me as particularly cheerful creatures, but even the most tenebrous tomcat will surely be moved to purr by all you've brought us. Give me a moment to present these gifts to Roaring Spring.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_002_000<tab>Well, if Ibuki and her team aren't anything less than delighted, I think we may have to consider <var 1A 02 /var>them<var 1A 01 /var> monsters. I'll just be a moment.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_003_000<tab>Right then! I do believe we've accumulated sufficient succor for our blearily blinking comrade. I shall be back anon.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_001<tab>The results are in. Those items you procured for us...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_002<tab>...are the best thing since sliced Archon loaf! Ahahahahaha!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_003<tab>No longer shall our backs suffer the cricks and cramps of outrageous furniture! With renewed health and mental clarity may we set upon our work and meet our deadlines without need for extensions!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_004<tab>...Probably!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_005<tab>Ahem. Theatrics aside, we are very grateful to you, kind <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((sir)) /var>. I'm afraid my complaints superseded a more civilized greeting, so allow me to properly introduce myself.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_006<tab>My name is Margrat, and I work as a specialist in propulsion engineering here in Sharlayan Hamlet.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_007<tab>Under the supervision of Kokkol Dankkol, my team participated in the development of not just the aetherburner, but the myriad ancillary propulsion systems of the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_008<tab>As our assignment concerned the crux of the project, we worked in tandem with a variety of other laboratories.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_009<tab>My team was charged with performing analyses of the physical and aetherial phenomena to which the internal components would be subjected.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_010<tab>Another team calculated the necessary energy costs of all propulsion systems and proposed refinements to improve aetherial conductivity...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_011<tab>And yet <var 1A 02 /var>another<var 1A 01 /var> team drafted the plans that reconciled all our disparate findings into one cohesive image. Thus we spun our web of productivity.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_012<tab>Of course, a specialist is only as special as the demand for their expertise. So once the Final Days were thwarted and the threat to our lives no more, the threat to our <var 1A 02 /var>livelihoods<var 1A 01 /var> reared its ugly head.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_013<tab>Thankfully, our experience with the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> was of value to Garlond Ironworks, who offered my team the opportunity to collaborate on new airship engines. And so we live to labor another day!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_014<tab>True to their Garlean roots, they rely heavily on ceruleum to power their engines, but with a few adjustments raw aether can also─
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_015<tab>...Ah, but you know all about aether's potential, don't you! Tell me, why <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> you need those tanks?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_016<tab>It's not often─or ever, really─that people come clamoring for tanks with the capacity to power an interstellar vessel. Fancied a jaunt to the moon, did you? Ha ha!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_017<tab>...You ripped a <var 1A 02 /var>hole<var 1A 01 /var> in the moon!? To forestall a voidsent invasion.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_018<tab>Ahahaha! Pull the other one, it's got bells on! Next you'll be claiming you're a Scion. Next stop, Ultima Thule!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_019<tab>...Hm? Why are you giving me that look?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_020<tab>...Wait. What did you say your name was?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_021<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>. Right. The very <var 29 EB02 /var> who went to Ultima Thule with the other Scions.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_022<tab>...Rhalgr smite you, Theopauldin. Would it have <var 1A 02 /var>killed<var 1A 01 /var> you to say something!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_023<tab>All of us were...were so consumed by work back then that we never got so much of a glimpse of the Scions, let alone...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_024<tab>And now here I am whinging to you about <var 1A 02 /var>back pain<var 1A 01 /var>. What a laugh...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_025<tab>...A-Apologies! I had no idea you were <var 1A 02 /var>the<var 1A 01 /var> <var 29 EB02 /var>! It's, uh, quite a lot to process...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_026<tab>Thank you for taking the time to help us.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_027<tab>And, um...if you're so inclined, we would be terribly grateful for your continued assistance!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_028<tab>Thesauros is unlikely to loosen its purse strings any time soon, and we're still in dire need of things to improve our quality of life here in Labyrinthos.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_029<tab>What say you? I'll make you an honorary member of our team─or better yet, my own personal gleaner!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_Q1_001_030<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A1_001_031<tab>The honor would be mine!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A1_001_032<tab>Compensation? Benefits? “Sod you, pay me,” as they say.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_033<tab>An answer fit for a hero! Glad to have you with us.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_034<tab>Spoken like a born freelancer! But to answer your questions, I could paper the city with the amount of scrips I have lying around. You have my word that we shan't leave you wanting.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_001<tab>Our resident cat-lover insisted that he address you personally, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_002<tab>I wanted to thank you for your many thoughtful donations. Their quality is astounding!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_003<tab>The lab cats have taken to them straightaway. Just seeing the joy writ plain upon their furry little faces has lifted the spirits of the whole team.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_004<tab>By the by, have you given any thought as to what sort of research Roaring Spring and his crew of cat-lovers might specialize in?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_005<tab>It may defy expectations, given what you've learned of them thus far, but any guesses?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_006<tab>Believe it or not, they are all experts in aero- and aetherdynamics─the studies of how air and aether move, respectively.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_007<tab>It is their comprehensive understanding of these mechanics which enabled them to devise not only the optimal form of our teeny-tiny toy boat, but that of its individual components as well.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_008<tab>So while <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> were all losing our heads over the aetherburner, Roaring Spring and his colleagues were calmly ensuring that we had somewhere to stick the damnable thing.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_009<tab>...Which brings me to my question: why is your laboratory overrun with felines? Did the stress finally break you?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_010<tab>Not as such. Our kitties are the fluffy keystones of our latest intellectual challenge.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_011<tab>In the aftermath of the Final Days, we received a letter from an Eorzean naturalist named Marcette, who, er...<var 1A 02 /var>stridently<var 1A 01 /var> implored us to investigate a rather puzzling phenomenon.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_012<tab>The “spontaneous flight of traditionally flightless organisms.”
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_013<tab>Shocking, yes. Imagine an adamantoise or dhalmel suddenly rising into the air and darting away!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_014<tab>But while such incidents may seem queer and inexplicable, we believe we can identify the root cause. Insofar as it relates to aviation, at least.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_015<tab>And once we know how these aerial feats were accomplished, we can assess which subjects may be manifesting latent abilities and which ones may be outliers of one sort or another.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_016<tab>For her part, Marcette seems convinced that there are no outliers─that every subject was possessed of “ancestral levitational predisposition”─but regardless of the outcome, our research may revolutionize our understanding of aviation!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_017<tab>Indeed, even with my limited expertise, I can see the potential...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_018<tab>Naturally, our first step was to observe flight-gifted samples in captivity. And among those we collected, we found...<var 1A 02 /var>it<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_019<tab>An enormous flying kitty cat!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_020<tab>Such grace! Such beauty! How could the air and aether <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> embrace you? How could the laws of nature not contort themselves to cradle your winsome curves!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_021<tab>Yet a mystery it remains. A fabulous, fluffy mystery. One to which we will devote our waking days to unravel.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_022<tab>...That's wonderful, Roaring Spring! I hope you all find fulfillment in both your pioneering research and your kitties' care.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_023<tab>Thank you, Margrat. I know we shall.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_024<tab>And thank <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, my friend. We are fortunate to have been aided by such an accomplished gleaner.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_025<tab>Yes, well. “Gleaner” may have been the term I used to describe <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> for simplicity's sake, but truth be told, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> isn't of the guildship.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_026<tab>This is <var 29 EB02 /var>. One of the Scions who went aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_027<tab>...What?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_028<tab>So I've been waxing poetic about kitty cats to...no, <var 1A 02 /var>commissioning<var 1A 01 /var> kitty goods from...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_029<tab>I-If you'll excuse me! ...<var 1A 02 /var>Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa<var 1A 01 /var>!!!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_030<tab>...I'll, er. Go and check on him later.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_001<tab>Look, I've procured something of my own! A researcher brimming with gratitude.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_002<tab>None of us were expecting anything remotely close to the quality of what you delivered. The whole team couldn't be happier.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_003<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Finally<var 1A 01 /var> we'll have furnishings more inspiring than peeling wallpaper and criminally slow timepieces. I can feel my investment in the drudgery improving already!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_004<tab>So? What do you suppose Ibuki and her colleagues spend their time studying whilst their monstrous miniatures keep vigil?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_Q_003_005<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_003_006<tab>Life sciences! I'd stake my life on it!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_003_007<tab>Monster...materials?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_003_008<tab>Have we confirmed they're not actually adventurers in disguise?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_009<tab>Oh, don't do that! While biologists were called in for the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>'s development, they didn't belong to Ibuki's cohort. Although I can see why you might assume so.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_010<tab>Warm! Very warm indeed!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_011<tab>Ahahaha! Skepticism well warranted, to be sure.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_012<tab>Ibuki's team specializes in materials engineering, so they were tasked with deciding what the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> should be made of.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_013<tab>As the mission was of the greatest import, candidate materials were subjected to rigorous testing to ensure safe and reliable operation.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_014<tab>For instance, every component within the engines had to withstand both the heat and stress the engine itself generated, as well as whatever bumps and scrapes it might suffer during the course of the ship's journey.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_015<tab>However, if the durable, heat-resistant materials they chose had been too heavy or difficult to work with, our starship would have been effectively the world's largest doorstop.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_016<tab>So to ensure the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> could actually fly and not be reduced to fondue in the process, Ibuki and her colleagues searched high and low for materials suited to each and every part. And on the occasion they failed to find what they needed, they rolled up their sleeves and created it themselves.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_017<tab>People tend to be more interested in the bigger picture─by <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> is being made rather than what it's made <var 1A 02 /var>of<var 1A 01 /var>─but I've made my peace with it. It's a fairly mundane job, truth be told.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_018<tab>Not from where I'm standing! You and your lab are the heroes who help us realize our wildest dreams. We are forever in your debt.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_019<tab>Well, if you'd <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> like to repay the favor, you might try making a good faith effort to actually meet your deadline next time.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_020<tab>These days, we mostly deal in arms and armor production with external collaborators.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_021<tab>No matter how much you improve upon the previous model, adventurers always demand harder, better, faster, <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> stronger...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_022<tab>Which necessitates a more in-depth understanding of the circumstances which demand such performance. So we conduct simulations based on actual and theoretical experiences of veteran adventurers.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_023<tab>Which in turn means extensive research into the myriad monstrosities of the world! Perhaps <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> extensive, given how it has influenced our team.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_024<tab>“Influenced” being “instilled an obsession in.”
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_025<tab>Now whenever we see any reproduction of a monster, the potential battle begins...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_026<tab>Sharp claws! A lumbering blow! No, wait─<var 1A 02 /var>toxic, molten breath<var 1A 01 /var>! All powerless to penetrate our perfectly selected materials!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_027<tab>Then comes the counter─pikes piercing hardened scale! Blades carving through jets of viscous bile! Driving unimpeded towards their fleshy prize!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_028<tab>Aaah, I get shivers just thinking about it!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_029<tab>...Considering your long and storied tenure, you may have worn or wielded something developed by Ibuki's team and not even known it!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_030<tab>Are guildship missions so perilous these days?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_031<tab>...<var 29 EB02 /var>?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_032<tab>Hyaaaaaaaaaaaagh! What─ How─ Whe-huh!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_033<tab>S-S-Signature! O-On the thing you just brought me, did you sign─!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_034<tab>Just your initials on the underside!? No, <var 1A 02 /var>please<var 1A 01 /var>! Your full name, next time! Across the front!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_035<tab>N-N-Name! D-Did you sign your name on what you brought!? “Collected by <var 29 EB02 /var>”!?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_036<tab>What do you mean you don't sign that sort of thing!? That's─well, no, that's fair. But...please sign <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var> for me! Next time?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_037<tab>And <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, Margrat! How <var 1A 02 /var>dare<var 1A 01 /var> you conceal such crucial information!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_038<tab>Just wait till the rest of the team hears about this!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_001<tab>Look! Wouldn't you say Grondilvet's eyes glimmer with renewed vitality?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_002<tab>I sincerely doubt they <var 1A 02 /var>look<var 1A 01 /var> any different. But the efficacy of the items you provided is undeniable.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_003<tab>I've suffered fewer headaches, and my vision does seem clearer. I daresay this newfound comfort will enable me to execute my work with even greater precision.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_004<tab>You have been a boon to me and my team.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_005<tab>Out of curiosity, why so much intense squinting of late? It must be awfully delicate stuff to tax your eyesight so.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_006<tab>Indeed it is. Our current assignment is complicated─sometimes punishingly so─but we are resolved to see it through.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_007<tab>You see, during the ark's conversion to the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>, I spoke with Lominsan arcanists come to deliver supplies.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_008<tab>It wasn't long before we discovered, to our mutual delight, the uncanny similarities between arcanima and systems aetherology.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_009<tab>Arcane geometries were first conceived as a means to perceive and manipulate aetheric energy in specific natural environments─namely those of the south sea isles, the presumed birthplace of arcanima.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_010<tab>But while our regulators were designed to serve a rather different purpose, the underlying principles of their operation are more or less the same.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_011<tab>Now that we needn't concern ourselves with the end of civilization, we are free to engage in joint research with our friends in the Arcanists' Guild.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_012<tab>Sounds like our arrangement with Garlond Ironworks! What is your current objective?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_013<tab>We seek to incorporate analytical and conditional branching functionalities into a framework utilizing arcane geometries.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_014<tab>By iterating this process, we hope to produce a single, comprehensive system capable of a heretofore unrealized feat.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_015<tab>To wit, one capable of automatically heating foodstuffs to optimal temperature for consumption!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_016<tab>Wh-What did you just say!?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_017<tab>You mean, our days of eating cold Archon burgers would be over? Your arcane wotsit would be able to restore them to their original juicy glory!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_018<tab>Mankind need never suffer cold burgers again.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_019<tab>Byregot has blessed you with His genius, Grondilvet! The world will never be the same after your aetheric food warmer is complete!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_020<tab>You agree, don't you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_021<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Why is that name so familiar...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_022<tab>Oh dear...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_023<tab>Er, about that. I should have mentioned sooner, but <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is <var 29 EB02 /var> of the Scions. One of the heroes who traveled aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> to the end of the known universe.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_024<tab>...Margrat. I expected more from you, of all people. To have let me in ignorance impose upon the goodwill of such an esteemed personage─

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_025<tab>I understand how you feel, I do. But that's <var 1A 02 /var>why<var 1A 01 /var> I...I just...wanted everyone to get to know <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_026<tab>Not as a hero on a pedestal whom we would never dare to approach, but as a person, like you and me. And I wanted <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to get to know everyone, too. The nameless faces that worked so hard to make <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> journey possible, and raised their voices in cheer at <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> triumphant return.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_027<tab>...I suppose we <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> be glad for further donations, should <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> be willing and able to oblige us. My laboratory would of course contribute to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> due compensation, as well.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_028<tab>Until next time, then. ...And thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. For everything.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_100<tab>(-???-)Pardon me...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_101<tab>(-Reticent Researcher-)Erm, about that request I submitted earlier...have they reached a consensus?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_001_102<tab>...All materials necessary for your current research have been allocated. Additional supplies will not be forthcoming.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_103<tab>(-Reticent Researcher-)O-Oh... I see...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_104<tab>Thus spoke the wise bureaucrats unto the obeisant workers. Tell us! What unreasonable desire did you dare voice to our overlords?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_105<tab>(-Reticent Researcher-)Oh, hello, Margrat.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_106<tab>(-Reticent Researcher-)I didn't think it was <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> unreasonable, all things considered. What are we supposed to do now...?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_107<tab>Hmm... As good a chance as any...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_108<tab>I do believe we have your next commission!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_109<tab>The despondent man you see before you is Roaring Spring, a fellow researcher formerly assigned to the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> project─albeit on a different team.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_110<tab>I would be much obliged if you could procure whatever it was Thesauros refused him. He's a gentle soul, deserving of far better treatment than he's received, and I think you'll find his area of expertise fascinating─if you can guess what it is, that is! Well?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_111<tab>Rejoice, Roaring Spring! It just so happens that we have a special offer on all things Thesauros is too parsimonious to provide.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_112<tab>My great and benevolent gleaner friend will be happy to deliver your unreasonable desires.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_113<tab>L-Like I said, I don't think it's <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> unreasonable, it's just... Truly?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_114<tab>Well then, er...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_115<tab>C-C-Cat food!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_116<tab>O-Or treats? Toys! Anything to amuse and delight our laboratory's kitty cats!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_117<tab>Their comfort is our comfort─their happiness, our happiness!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_118<tab>Anything in bulk would be greatly appreciated!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_119<tab>Ahahaha! Kitty cats!? Since when did you and your colleagues become so adorable?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_120<tab>...A bit of a surprising request, but we can hardly fault him for his passion. See what you can come up with, and I'll be sure to pass it along!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_100<tab>(-???-)Oi, Hodge! I've come for my package. Where is it!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_002_101<tab>...The items you requested were deemed nonessential.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_102<tab>(-Raging Researcher-)“Nonessential,” eh? And is my willingness to toil away in those bland biscuit boxes you call laboratories nonessential? Is my <var 1A 02 /var>motivation<var 1A 01 /var> nonessential!? Is it!?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_002_103<tab>...You are free to purchase whatever you like with personal funds.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_104<tab>(-Raging Researcher-)<var 1A 02 /var>You're<var 1A 01 /var> a personal fund!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_105<tab>...Good one.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_106<tab>Ibuki? While I understand your frustration, you cannot simply unleash your concentrated ire all at once to effect a change. Nay, we must use the paymasters' methods against their agents. As they slowly grind away at our spirits, so too must we wear down Hodge.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_107<tab>I'll bear that in mind, Margrat. And how's your deadline looking?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_108<tab>I'll deadline <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> if you ever lead with <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> again!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_109<tab>S-Sorry, sorry. Clearly you <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> understand my frustration. I presume, like me, you've been <var 1A 02 /var>trying<var 1A 01 /var> to improve your team's working conditions, but to no avail...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_110<tab>Precisely why I called you over. If Thesauros is giving you the cold shoulder, we may be able to help.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_Q_002_111<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_002_112<tab>My neck and shoulder muscles are generally warm from prodigious use.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_002_113<tab>You don't think this is going to be another cat thing, do you?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_114<tab>The better for you to communicate your shared desire that none labor in misery! Huzzah!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_115<tab>Who knows? There's no end to delightful surprises here in Labyrinthos!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_116<tab>You're in good hands, comrade. As an extension of our special offer, let us provide you with the conveniences Thesauros won't.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_117<tab>My exclusive gleaner is happy to procure anything your heart desires. You need but ask!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_118<tab>I'm, er...not sure what's going on, but far be it from me to look a gift chocobo in the mouth!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_119<tab>We would like...monsters! Fiends, feral beasts, voidsent, primals─whatever you can provide. Miniatures, that is!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_120<tab>Any size, style, or shape. Wood carvings, life-sized cushions, soap sculptures. Honestly, <var 1A 02 /var>anything<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_121<tab>If you need specific examples, one of the Ironworks engineers is a warmachina fanatic who crafts stunningly realistic replicas. Or you might reference the more simplistic mammets created by that infamous Gridanian goldsmith.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_122<tab>Even if you can only manage supplies, we would be more than delighted to make our own miniatures! ...Time permitting.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_123<tab>Right, well─now that I've thoroughly embarrassed myself, thank you in advance, kind stranger!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_124<tab>Ibuki was assigned to the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> project as well. Any guesses as to what her specialty is? Let me know when you think you've figured it out─and when your first monstrous donation is ready for delivery!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_100<tab>(-Rational Researcher-)Ibuki just ran by shrieking like a jilted chocobo. Is something amiss?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_101<tab>(-Rational Researcher-)...I suppose there's no telling with her. Never mind─ Hodge, I'm here to collect my supplies.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_003_102<tab>...Your request was denied. You are encouraged to recuperate at home.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_103<tab>(-Rational Researcher-)Ha! That's rich.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_003_104<tab>Rich or not, that is the official answer.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_003_105<tab>...But those two have a special offer for rejected petitioners.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_106<tab>Why, Hodge! The very nerve of you!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_107<tab>(-Rational Researcher-)Well met, Margrat. I'm glad to find you in high spirits and not your usual state of inconsolable weeping.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_108<tab>(-Rational Researcher-)I believe we have yet to be acquainted. Grondilvet, systems aetherologist.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_109<tab>No, no, no! Grondilvet, your good breeding ruined our fun little game! I've been challenging <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to guess who did what on the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_110<tab>Our systems aetherologists basically ensured that, on an arcane level, the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> was easy to operate.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_111<tab>Each component was imbued with supplementary magick─and <var 1A 02 /var>without<var 1A 01 /var> having to employ overworked mages scurrying about activating geometries.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_112<tab>This was possible because many systems were designed to function automatically in the presence of sufficient aether. But how do you ensure the requisite quantities of aether are supplied throughout the ship?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_113<tab>Call in the systems aetherologists! Grondilvet's team was tasked with the development of regulators to reallocate aether as the systems dictate, so when our furry pilots engaged the throttle, the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> sped up instead of sputtering to a halt. Or exploding.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_114<tab>Needless to say, it is intricate work that requires a deep understanding of how a host of complex mechanisms interact. Far beyond the scope of a harried gaggle of mages.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_115<tab>Goodness. Your effulgent praise has my bosom all atingle.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_116<tab>But returning to what Hodge mentioned─you are fulfilling requests which Thesauros denies?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_117<tab>Why, we are indeed! My exclusive gleaner here is second to none when satisfying the needs of the needy. Take advantage of our free trial today!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_118<tab>Though I'm curious as to what prompted said trial, it would be foolish to reject your offer.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_119<tab>Very well. Might I commission some remedies for weary eyes?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_120<tab>Eye drops would suffice, as would items that improve circulation. Foodstuffs purported to improve visual acuity would be welcome, too.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_121<tab>If it may aid in the preservation or enhancement of eyesight, my team and I would welcome whatever you can provide.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_122<tab>Ahhh, I <var 1A 02 /var>see<var 1A 01 /var>! Been burning the midnight oil, have we? A man after my own heart.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_123<tab>Well then, my gleaning genius! Let's find this hard worker respite for his tired eyes, shall we?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>Margrat is pleased with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Kind Collaborator<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>Margrat is delighted with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Facilitator of Feline Felicity<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>Margrat is overjoyed with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gracious Gleaner<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>Margrat could not be happier with your efforts. She now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Irreplaceable Comrade<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>And yet, there is still much work to be done if the researchers of Sharlayan Hamlet are to have their myriad needs met. To that end, Margrat has a new favor to ask of you...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab>Through your efforts, many dedicated intellectuals have found comfort and respite. It seems, however, that Margrat has something on her mind...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>The Custom Deliveries list for Margrat has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Margrat and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>A new quest continuing the story of Margrat's work in Sharlayan Hamlet is now available. Upon its completion, the Custom Deliveries list for Margrat will be updated.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_000<tab>...Hm? Why have I not returned to my lab and my other neglected responsibilities?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_001<tab>Never you fear; I'll tend to the perpetual bin fires just as soon as you leave. ...You're in no hurry to go, right?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_000<tab>I respect your dedication, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Hand-delivering commissions on time and with a smile...now that's service.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_001<tab>Despite what others may whisper (and occasionally declare loudly within earshot), I too strive for punctuality! And were it not for the bastar─er, <var 1A 02 /var>management<var 1A 01 /var> stipulating such...<var 1A 02 /var>aggressive<var 1A 01 /var> deadlines, I might well have time for a smile or two!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_000<tab>Excellent, this should do us quite nicely. ...I take it you'll be going, then?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_001<tab>You could always stay awhile longer, you know! There's no need to rush─we could chat! Please? Everyone else is so busy and Hodge is no fun at all! ...<var 1A 02 /var>Please<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_000<tab>Thanks to your tireless efforts, our quality of life here in Sharlayan Hamlet has been drastically improved.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_001<tab>Wouldn't you agree, Hodge? I'm sure <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here has also spared you a modicum of grief.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_HODGE_004_002<tab>...If you wish to spare me grief, you might refrain from causing it in the first place.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_003<tab>Oh, that Hodge. He plays coy, but there's no denying that you have done much and more to ease Thesauros's burdens.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_004<tab>Mark my words: if we keep peddling your services, one day Hodge will leap over his desk and wring your hand in tearful gratitude! Or perhaps just offer a genuine word of thanks!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_005_000<tab>Hodge! Have I mentioned in the past bell just how much <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here has single-handedly improved the state of Labyrinthos with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> contributions?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_005_001<tab>Roaring Spring and Ibuki and Grondilvet and all their teams─and a great number of other researchers besides─have showered <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> with a veritable deluge of praise.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_005_002<tab>Now it's your turn! One word, just one <var 1A 02 /var>tiny<var 1A 01 /var> little word of appreciation on behalf of Thesauros! Let's hear it!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_HODGE_005_003<tab>...I process requests. I do not issue public statements.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_005_004<tab>...It may not seem like it, but we're making progress! We'll coax a heartfelt expression of gratitude from him yet!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_005_005<tab>Trust me, I've been bothering Hodge for years now; he's like an old, musty tome I've read cover to cover a dozen times. I see all the subtleties between the lines. So let's keep up the good work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_006_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, there's been a development...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_006_001<tab>According to Theopauldin, we've seen significantly increased returns from each and every laboratory here in Labyrinthos.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_006_002<tab>An external assessment might conclude that the projects we began in the wake of the Final Days have simply begun to yield results. That our labors were bound to bear fruit eventually. But we all know better.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_006_003<tab>We know that our increased productivity─not to mention sunny morale─is largely thanks to you, my industrious friend.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_006_004<tab>Which means that Hodge is now <var 1A 02 /var>obligated<var 1A 01 /var> to say something nice, if only out of basic decency!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_HODGE_006_005<tab>...The gratitude I must express is threefold.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_HODGE_006_006<tab>First, for the safe return of you and your fellow Scions to the star.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_HODGE_006_007<tab>Second, for the procurement of resources that Thesauros has been reluctant to provide. And third, for your social and moral support of the researchers here.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_HODGE_006_008<tab>...It warms my heart to see them happy.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_RANKUP_MARGRAT_006_009<tab>Hodge, you─! H-How dare you force me to weep tears of gratitude in your s-stead, you sneak! You c-crafty gil-pincher! You emotional capitalist! <sob>

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_AFTWEEKLY_000_000<tab>You have delivered the weekly maximum of six items to Margrat. You may begin making deliveries again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_MARGRAT_000_000<tab>Who's next to storm the gates, I wonder?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_QUEST_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>In order to undertake the next quest, speak with Margrat as a Disciple of the Hand or the Land.
